description: These simple gluten free crêpes are delicious with all types of fillings and can also be used for savoury dishes.
name: Crêpes with Lemon & Honey Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Tip the flour into a large bowl and make a well in the centre. Crack in the egg, add a quarter of the milk and mix well with an electric whisk. Gradually add the rest of the milk, whisking to form a smooth batter.

Heat a knob of butter in a large non-stick pan on medium heat and add a small ladleful of batter to the pan. Swirl to coat the pan in a thin layer and cook for 2-3 minutes, flip and cook for 1-2 minutes on the other side or until golden brown. Repeat with the rest of the batter.
Serve rolled up with lemon juice and a drizzle of honey.
